channel.title: Shops+pkp
channel.description: in my slayer and pc shop you can buy chaotics for coins, where can i go to change that? pi source btw and in my funpk if you kill someone you gain pkp where can i change that to where it doesnt? also, in one of my minigames thats in wildy, if you DIE you gain pkp. anyone know where i can make mage arena NOT do that? any help is greatly appreciated
